name: Notre Dame High School Bread Dough
author: Charlotte Hooper
instructions:
Mix yeast and sugar with water. Stir until dissolved. Add butter, salt and dry milk. Stir well. Then add flour, beating after each cup. When mixed, knead dough for 3 minutes. Divide dough into 3 parts. Shape into French style loaves and place on greased cookie sheets. Let rise until double in size. Bake at 350Â° for 30 minutes.
Great for spaghetti dinner or French style sandwiches.
